plot: Aang and Katara inadvertently set off a trap the brings the warmongering Fire Nation to the Southern Water Tribe's peaceful village at the South Pole.

After Aang and Katara fall into a trap inside what is left of a Fire Nation's ship, a fire signal is sent to the sky as a result. Sokka banishes Aang from the Water Tribe and Katara considers the idea of going with him to become a Water-bender. As the Fire Nation approaches to the Water Tribe of the South Pole, Sokka valiantly prepares to defender it. Prince Zuko comes down from the ship and easily defeats Sokka, who nevertheless accomplishes to hit Prince Zuko in the back of the head with a boomerang. Prince Zuko is looking for the Avatar. Aang arrives to help the Water Tribe as he saw the Fire Nation's ship approaching. It is clearly stated that Aang is the Avatar even when he is just a child. The small first fight between Aang and Zuko.—David del Real ---@DavidRealActor----
